headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERROCAL, TORRES, IDA INEZ

snippet: BERROCAL-TORRES--Ida Inez. Not only have we lost a great friend and client of more than 50 years, but the trade union movement has lost a giant (despite Ida's size). Her diminished eye sight did not prevent Ida from knowing and vigorously enforcing the Local 3, RWDSU-UFCW- Bloomingdale's Collective Bargaining Agreement, as well as knowing every member of Local 3. All who knew her will sorely miss her. With Love, Eisner & Associates PC Eugene G. Eisner, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: BERROCAL-TORRES--Ida Inez. Not only have we lost a great friend and client of more than 50 years, but the trade union movement has lost a giant (despite Ida's size). Her diminished eye sight did not prevent Ida from knowing and vigorously enforcing the Local 3, RWDSU-UFCW- Bloomingdale's Collective Bargaining Agreement, as well as knowing every member of Local 3. All who knew her will sorely miss her. With Love, Eisner & Associates PC Eugene G. Eisner, President 1/3
